TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DisplayMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定义用于指示 所使用的显示模式的标识符。

span.span: Defines identifiers that indicate the display modes used by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识符用于指示用来显示每个字节序列的显示模式。The identifiers are used to indicate the display mode used to display each byte sequence. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标识符。The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ByteViewerExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ByteViewerExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode Ansi = int32(2)

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用标识符。The following code example demonstrates how to use identifiers. 此代码示例摘自更大的示例为提供类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ComponentModel.Design.DisplayMode Auto = int32(4)

summary.span: 自动选择显示模式的显示模式。

span.span: A display mode that automatically selects a display mode.

summary.span: 在此模式下，将对字节进行检查，以确定它们是否为十六进制或可打印的格式。

span.span: In this mode, the bytes are examined to determine if they are hexadecimal or printable.

summary.span: 如果字节为十六进制格式，则将选择 模式。

span.span: If the bytes are in hexadecimal format, the mode is selected.

summary.span: 如果字符匹配可打印的字符集，则运行一项测试，以自动选择 或 显示模式。

span.span: If the characters match a printable character set, a test is run to automatically select either the or display mode.
